questions.question: An ML engineer needs to develop an audio podcast from written scripts. The ML engineer must introduce a unique break after each paragraph of the script. Which solution will meet these requirements?
options: Use Amazon Transcribe to convert the text to speech. Define the breaks by using intents.
Use Amazon Polly to convert the text to speech. Define the breaks by using lexicons.
Use Amazon Comprehend to convert the text to speech. Define the breaks by using Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML).
Use Amazon Polly to convert the text to speech. Define the breaks by using Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML).
correct_answers: Use Amazon Polly to convert the text to speech. Define the breaks by using Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML).
questions.Practice test: Official Practice Exam: AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate (MLA-C01 - English)
